protocol.name: P-GSE26084-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-2
protocol.text: 10 day old seedlings in 100 microliter medium were infected with 10 microliter of 0.0002 ABS600 bacteria, continued incubation at 25oC for 24 h, and flash frozen in liquid N2.

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-3
protocol.text: Strelilized Arabidopsis seeds Col-0 expressing hRluc under the CaMV 35S promoter were grown for 10 days in MS medium with vitamins (Phytotechnologies, CA) with 0.5 % sucrose (adjusted in the beginning to pH 5.8) with 75 microE light, 18 h photoperiod and 80% humidity at 22oC. Bacteria were grown to mid-exponential phase in LB.

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using RNeasy Plant mini kit (Qiagen) according to manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-6
protocol.text: Chips were hybridized according standard Affymetrix protocol, and washed in GeneChip 450 fluidics station.

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneArray 3000 7G Scanner

protocol.name: P-GSE26084-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) in GCOS environment using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
